title: What do you rush on these champions (Without the DFG)
body: So DFG is removed (R.I.P) and i play AP assassins alot mostly Kata and Ahri or LeBlanc. And I want to know what would be the best thing to rush on these 3 champions individually now.

replies.body: zhonya rush is always good for kat but its generally hard to build a rod item in laning, old rush used to be haunting and sorc boots which is pretty decent and reliable, and for the other two popular builds seem to be morello into void/dcap or zhonya if ad mid, void if they go mr (athenes) d cap for the stupid damage. hope i helped
Most of these champions have enough burst potential so Morellos for Mana regen and CDR. If they are manaless, Dcap.
